layman_description: Adds a color tint to an item's picture in your inventory menu.
technical_description: Applies RGB hex color modulation to the CustomIcon texture asset.
player_impact: Makes item icons visually distinctive with custom colors in inventory displays.

layman_description: Sets how many of this item you can hold together in one inventory slot.
technical_description: Defines the maximum quantity for inventory slot consolidation.
player_impact: Higher stacks mean more efficient backpack use for resources and ammo.

layman_description: The amount of currency traders will pay you for selling this item.
technical_description: Base economic value used in trader exchange calculations.
player_impact: Determines profit when selling looted items to merchants.

layman_description: Determines what category this item appears under in your inventory menu.
technical_description: Enum classification for UI inventory categorization and sorting.
player_impact: Helps you find items quickly in your packed backpack.

layman_description: Shows a small symbol next to the item name in menus to indicate its type.
technical_description: References a UI symbol asset for quick visual identification.
player_impact: Lets you recognize item types at a glance without reading names.

layman_description: Links to the item's description text shown when you hover over it in menus.
technical_description: Localization key for dynamic tooltip text rendering.
player_impact: Provides helpful hints about what an item does when you inspect it.

layman_description: Places this item in a specific category folder in the inventory menu.
technical_description: Hierarchical grouping for inventory UI organization.
player_impact: Organizes your backpack contents into logical sections.

layman_description: Shows the quality level of an item (like 'worn', 'good', 'perfect') on its inventory card.
technical_description: Enables quality tier rendering in inventory item tooltips.
player_impact: Helps you compare item condition before deciding what to keep or sell.

layman_description: The 3D model file used to display this item in your hands and in the world.
technical_description: References to FBX or game model assets for item rendering.
player_impact: Determines how the item looks when you're holding or looking at it.

layman_description: How your character holds this item (like one-handed, two-handed, or over shoulder).
technical_description: Defines character animation state and item positioning in first-person view.
player_impact: Affects your movement speed and how items feel to use in combat.

layman_description: What this block is made of and what resources it drops when harvested.
technical_description: Associates block instance with material property group and harvesting values.
player_impact: Determines what tools work best and what you collect when breaking it.

layman_description: Custom icon shown in building menus for this block variant.
technical_description: Override for default block icon in placement UI.
player_impact: Makes it easier to identify blocks in construction menus.

layman_description: Controls where in the building menu this block appears relative to others.
technical_description: Numeric sorting priority for inventory block organization.
player_impact: Helps you find frequently-used blocks quickly when building.

layman_description: How much space this block takes up (like 2x2 or 3x1).
technical_description: Defines block dimensions in voxel coordinates for placement validation.
player_impact: Affects whether you can fit the block in tight spaces.

layman_description: Number of inventory slots inside a container block for storing items.
technical_description: Defines container capacity in unit storage slots.
player_impact: Determines how much loot you can store in chests and lockers.

layman_description: What resources you need to repair this item back to full condition.
technical_description: List of valid crafting ingredients for item restoration.
player_impact: Knowing repair costs helps you decide if fixing an item is worth it.

layman_description: How much health damage this weapon does to zombies and enemies.
technical_description: Entity damage value applied per hit to living entities.
player_impact: Determines how quickly you can kill enemies in combat.

layman_description: How much damage this tool does to blocks and structures.
technical_description: Block destruction damage value per hit applied during harvesting.
player_impact: Affects how fast you can break down buildings and mine resources.

layman_description: How far from you this item can reach or affect things (like weapon range or torch distance).
technical_description: Maximum distance for tool effectiveness or damage application.
player_impact: Determines your effective combat range and reach for tools.

layman_description: How heavy this item is and how much it weighs down your backpack.
technical_description: Mass value affecting inventory encumbrance calculations.
player_impact: Heavy items limit your carrying capacity and movement speed.
